title: Evil - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/14/22
itunes:title: Evil - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/14/22
description:
George Noory and theologian Matthew Fox discuss the spirituality of the universe, and how humans have lost sight of the sacred beauty in the world and don't examine evil in their own lives that keeps them away from other people.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
